price: 75. Hubaal Ibraahiim waa dulbadane, qalbi jilicsan19, toobad keen badan.
footnotes: 19. Taah iyo oohin badan markuu Alle baryayo, u murugood badan dadka, aad uga cabsada Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
